name: Fight Negativity
description:
You need to fight negativity, symbolized by the monsters.

Use the A and Z buttons to punch, Q and S to kick.
When your "Happyness" is full, press W or X to throw a fireball to your right or your left.

- Music: Joël Lamotte
- Other stuff: me

----------

This game have been created during the Self Care Jam (more infos here: https://itch.io/jam/les-game-jams-du-rijv-3-self-care).
